briefTitle: Phase3 Study of Amrubicin With Cisplatin Versus Etoposide-cisplatin for Extensive Disease Small Cell Lung Cancer

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Histologically/cytologically proven small cell lung cancer
* Extensive disease
* No prior chemotherapy regimen
* Age 18 years or older
* ECOG performance status of 0-1

Exclusion Criteria:

* Brain metastasis requiring treatment
* Treatment (Surgical or radiotherapy)of primary tumor
* Interstitial pneumonia or pulmonary fibrosis
* Abnormal cardiac function or myocardial infraction within 6 months before study enrollment

outcomeMeasures.title: Objective Response Rate
outcomeMeasures.description: Per Response Evaluation Criteria In Solid Tumors Criteria (RECIST v1.0) for target lesions and assessed by MRI: Complete Response (CR), Disappearance of all target lesions; Partial Response (PR), \>=30% decrease in the sum of the longest diameter of target lesions; Overall Response (OR) = CR + PR.
